answers.answer: Hi!I am sorry to hear about your medical problems. I understand that you have undergone a number of tests but I wonder if you have been tested for Vit B12 deficiency, vitamin D deficiency, anemia, vaso-vagal attack, multiple sclerosis, hypothyroidism, diabetes and panic attack. It can also be a type of seizure.  Please discuss with your doctor. Take care!The medical advice given should not be considered a substitute for medical care provided by a doctor who can examine you. The advice may not be completely correct for you as the doctor cannot examine you and does not know your complete medical history. Hence this reply to your post should only be considered as a guiding line and you must consult your doctor at the earliest for your medical problem.

question: HiI have had a severe Stiff neck about 10 months ago. After that I have neck pain and hand numbness in left arm and then in right arm and a strange Weakness in my foot. I have done CT scan, MRI, EMG, NCS and blood examination and all of these were normal. I had Physiotherapy, but it didn`t help me.   It is become chronic and I am so worried about it. Could anyone help me?  None of my doctors could diagnose my disease and I am so depressed.
title: hand and foot numbness
